sentences.en: Any appropriate type of parameter can be animated, also, exactly as with scripted plug - ins.
sentences.cn: 任何适当的类型的参数也能动画, 同样作为脚本正确地插入.

sentences.en: His tone on the air is serious and scripted.
sentences.cn: 他在电视上的语调是严肃而中规中矩的.

sentences.en: Indeed, once we start looking at It'scripted, we gain an entirely new perspective.
sentences.cn: 的的确确, 一旦我们开始把行为看作脚本行为, 我们再一次获得了全然的新景观.

sentences.en: Many novels were scripted for TV shows.
sentences.cn: 许多小说被改编成电视剧本.

sentences.en: Perform scripted actions in response to system shutdown or logoff.
sentences.cn: 执行脚本动作来响应系统的关闭或注销.

sentences.en: Scripted custom attributes can be added to any material or texture map.
sentences.cn: 脚本定制属性能增加到任何材质和纹理.

sentences.en: The more scripted traditional Tibetan songs and dances provoke stronger reactions.
sentences.cn: 传统藏族歌舞越是照本宣科,激起的反应就越是强烈.
这个剧作家手写了这部戏剧.

sentences.en: When a manager meets with Welch, the exchange is candid, not scripted.
sentences.cn: 管理人员会见韦尔奇时, 交谈是坦率而不加修饰的.

words.tran_cn: 圣经的；手稿的；依据圣经的
脚本；手迹；书写用的字母
（大写）圣经；手稿；（大写）圣经的一句

phrases.tran_cn: 脚本编辑器；脚本语言编辑器
n. 编剧；电影剧本作者

trans.tran_en: a speech or broadcast that is scripted has been written down before it is read

trans.tran_cn: 为电影（或戏剧等）写剧本( script的过去式和过去分词 )
